Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT IMP_SEGURADA_IX, PRM_TARIFARIO_IX, cod_opcao, vlprmtotpciocc
FROM seguros.v1bilhete_cober
 
WHERE
    cod_empresa   =   :COD_EMPRESA
and ramofr        =   :RAMOFR
and modalifr      =   :MODALIFR
and vlprmtot      =   :VLPRMTOT
and dtinivig     <=   :DTINIVIG
and dttervig     >=   :DTINIVIG
and ide_cobertura =   '1'
/
 END SQL
